content.raw:
I see your point but it might be a bit confusing because there are other private headers that are not installed in `include/ignition/transport`. I would propose:

* Move `NodeSharedPrivate.hh` to `include/ignition/transport` as it is to maintain consistency.
* Move all the private headers to a new directory `include/ignition/transport/private` to make it more evident (probably in a separate pull request).
* Remove all `*Private.hh` files and include its content in the `.cc` files (probably in a separate pull request).

Does it sound reasonable?
